name: KeQing
title: Driving Thunder
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

normalattack.name: Yunlai Sword
normalattack.description: Performs up to five rapid strikes. When charged, unleashes two rapid strikes.

elementalskill.name: Stellar Restoration
elementalskill.description: Throws a Lightning Stiletto at opponents and deals Electro DMG in small AoE. When held, she can adjust where the stilettos are thrown. She can also suspend them in the air and jump to them using Stellar Restoration.

elementalburst.name: Starward Sword
elementalburst.description: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Land's Overseer
passivetalent1.description: When dispatched to Liyue, the time taken to complete the task decreases by 25%.

passivetalent2.name: Thundering Penance
passivetalent2.description: If a Lightning Stiletto is present and Keqing recasts Stellar Restoration, her Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.

passivetalent3.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passivetalent3.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate and Energy Recharge increases by 15% for 8s.

constellations.d1: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.
constellations.d2: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attack's hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6: When initiating a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

profile.description: One of the Liyue Qixing, Keqing has an uncompromising belief in actions over words. If she sees something that needs doing, she'll do it herself. For example, she traveled around Liyue and carefully memorized each detail of the land so that she may one day be able to maximize the utility of every last inch of Liyue.Keqing deals with the day-to-day affairs of Liyue, whether great or small, while Rex Lapis only descends once a year.To many, the millennia of prosperity that Liyue has enjoyed serve to legitimize Rex Lapis' guidance of the city. But Keqing has her reservations about all this, viewing Liyue's present prosperity as akin to a magnificent sandcastle on the beach — humanity does not have the luxury of deciding when the tide will come in.Rex Lapis has watched over Liyue for a millennium. But what about the next millennium? What about the next ten, or the next hundred millennia? How long are we expecting this status quo to last?It is this unanswered question that drives Keqing to work relentlessly and remain diligent.From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.The people of Liyue have never considered navigating the future on their own terms. But someone must walk on the front line of the epoch and forge a new path with their own hands.From most people's perspective, there is no point in working oneself up like this. But Keqing cannot sit by idly and ignore this hidden danger.

zhdescription: 璃月七星之一，玉衡星。对「帝君一言而决的璃月」颇有微词——但实际上，神挺欣赏她这样的人。

zhnormalattack.name: 云来剑法
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击
进行至多五段的连续剑击。

重击
消耗一定体力,瞬间向前方挥出两剑。

zhelementalskill.name: 星斗归位
zhelementalskill.description:
迅速投出雷楔，以疾雷之势歼敌。雷楔命中时会对小范围内的敌人造成雷元素伤害,并在命中的位置留下雷楔标记。

长按
长按以调整雷楔标记投掷的方向。通过长按投出的雷楔，可以悬浮在空中,并使刻晴再次施放星斗归位时跨越地形。

雷楔
在雷楔的持续期间内,刻睛再次施放星斗归位或施展重击时,会清除雷楔标记并造成不同的效果：
·再次施放星斗归位时，瞬移到标记处进行一次斩击，造成雷元素范围伤害。瞬移至长按投掷的雷楔处时，可以跨越地形障碍；
·施展重击时，在标记处引发雷暴连斩，造成数次雷元素范围伤害。

zhelementalburst.name: 天街巡游
zhelementalburst.description: 爆发雷电的力量，造成范围雷元素伤害。随后隐入剑影中，对周围的敌人进行如同迅雷霆霓般疾速的连斩，造成多段雷元素伤害,并在最后一击时造成高额雷元素范围伤害。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 抵天雷罚
zhpassivetalent1.description: 雷楔存在期间再次施放星斗归位后的5秒内，刻晴的普通攻击和重击伤害转为雷元素伤害。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 玉衡之贵
zhpassivetalent2.description: 施放天街巡游时,刻晴的暴击率提升15%,元素充能效率提升15%，持续8秒。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 总务土地
zhpassivetalent3.description: 在璃月执行探索派遣任务时，消耗的时间缩短25%。

zhconstellations.d1: 雷楔存在期间再次施放星斗归位时，在刻晴消失与出现的位置造成50%攻击力的雷元素范围伤害。
zhconstellations.d2: 刻晴普通攻击与重击命中受到雷元素影响的敌人时，有50%几率产生一个元素微粒。该效果每5秒只能触发一次。
zhconstellations.d3: 天街巡游的技能等级提高3级。
zhconstellations.d4: 刻晴触发雷元素相关反应后的10秒内，攻击力提升25%。
zhconstellations.d5: 星斗归位的技能等级提高3级。
zhconstellations.d6: 进行普通攻击、重击、施放元素战技或元素爆发时，刻晴获得6%雷元素伤害加成，持续8秒。由普通攻击、重击、元素战技或元素爆发引起的效果分别独立存在。
